You can also unlock new characters like Rey and Kylo Ren from Star Warsâ„¢: The Force Awakensâ„¢ and put them on your team!

CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Build powerful light and dark side teams with heroes and other characters from the Star Wars universe. Make strategic choices and pick characters with complimentary abilities to construct squads like never before!

COLLECT ICONIC HEROES
Collect characters from the original trilogy and prequel films, animated TV shows like Star Warsâ„¢: The Clone Warsâ„¢ and Star Wars Rebelsâ„¢ â€“ and even Star Wars: The Force Awakens!

Make tactical decisions and equip your heroes with powerful gear to enhance their damage. Unlock special leader abilities to buff your team and unleash moves like Darth Sidiousâ€™s Force Lightning, Chewbaccaâ€™s Wookiee Rage, and more.

TEAM UP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and face off against powerful bosses like the Rancor by joining or creating a customizable Guild! Coordinate with your guildmates through Guild Chat and engage in Daily Guild Activities to earn shared rewards based on individual and Guild Leaderboards.

Feel the excitement of beating opponents in epic battles as you master the galactic hologames in a far off cantina. Installation instructions:
1. Install the normal version.
2. Finish the tutorial and connect to your google account. Non rooted users can ignore step 3.
3. Rooted users should install Lucky Patcher (If you do not already have it installed), give it root permissions and go to toolbox. Scroll down until you find "Patch to Android" tap it. Check the first 2 boxes and apply.
4. Signed is for non-rooted users. Unsigned is for root users only.
5. Uninstall the game but donâ€™t clear itâ€™s data. Now install one mod of your choosing. With Modded Google Play you can install over the normal version.
6. Launch the game and it will log you into Google Play.
7. You can still play the mod as a guest and connect to fb*.
